title: Policies and procedures for inmates requesting a medical or mental health treatment

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Policies and procedures for inmates requesting a medical or mental health treatment
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Written policies and procedures for inmates requesting a medical or mental health treatment (emergency and nonemergency). Written policies and procedures for ICE detainees requesting a medical or mental health treatment (emergency and nonemergency), if different.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sophia Wright

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Food Service Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Master-cycle menus; records of religious, special, therapeutic diets; and reviews of food service, including quarterly reviews and most recent review by a nutritionist or dietician between 2019 and 2026.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sophia Wright

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Medical transfers of ICE detainees
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records of ICE detainee transfers to health care facilities between 2019 and 2026. Procedures for medical transfers, including transportation, security and procedures for requests.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sophia Wright
